A new day dawned after Sara and I\nentered our relationship.%K%P
I felt like last night might have been a dream.%K%P
But my smartphone held the proof that\nit had really happened.%K%P
[From now on we're\nboyfriend and girlfriend.]%K%P
[I'm your girlfriend,\nand you're my boyfriend.]%K%P
As I read the message, I couldn't help but smile.%K%P
I knew I shouldn't get a big head,\nbut I wanted to shout this from the rooftops.\nSara Benzaiten was my girlfriend!%K%P
'Though now that I think about it...\nWhat should we do next?'%K%P
Sara just having a boyfriend didn't mean\nshe really understood love.%K%P
Now that it was official, I needed to think about\nwhat people did in a relationship.%K%P
I wanted her to be happy, of course,\nbut I also needed to work out a way\nfor Sara to get her singing voice back.%K%P
'Hey, Yamato.'%K%P
'I'm here now!'%K%P
While I was still trying to plan things out,\nSara made the first move herself.%K%P
'Yeah, you're here all right.'%K%P
'Sorry, am I bothering you?'%K%P
'It's just since we're going out now,\nI want to spend as much time with you as possible!'%K%P
Even now, I was still nervous around Sara,\nbut she closed the distance between us in no time.%K%P
'Do you have any plans today, Yamato?\nIf you're free, how about we hang out?'%K%P
'Sure, I don't have any plans anyway.\nAnd I'd like to spend time with you, too.'%K%P
'Yay!! We can be lovey-dovey all day long!'%K%P
'Lovey-dovey?'%K%P
I wasn't expecting her to use a phrase like that.%K%P
'Was that the wrong thing to say?'%K%P
'Uh, no, it's fine.\nI just sort of wonder what it would involve...'%K%P
'Hm, that is a serious issue. In that case...'%K%P
'Mmph!'%K%P
Sara hugged me close.\nJust like she always did.%K%P
Or so I thought. She didn't squeeze me like usual,\nbut froze up for some reason.%K%P
'Um... I'm sorry.'%K%P
She apologized suddenly and let me go.%K%P
'Is something wrong?'%K%P
'I know I do that all the time,\nbut it feels a little embarrassing now.'%K%P
'When I think about how you're my boyfriend,\nmy pulse really quickens.'%K%P
'Could THIS be... Love?!'%K%P
'I don't think we're there just yet.'%K%P
'Ha ha, I guess not.\nIt's not going to be as simple as that.'%K%P
Sara tried to laugh it off,\nbut she couldn't hide the blush\nspreading across her cheeks.%K%P
Perhaps she was trying to understand\nwhat a hug between lovers was like.%K%P
'...Here is your tea.'%K%P
'How nice of you. Thank you very much.'%K%P
Even though Sara was the one visiting,\nshe served me tea and was quite hospitable.%K%P
It hardly seemed like something\nthat couples would normally do.%K%P
'Want a rice cracker?'%K%P
'Sure, thanks.'%K%P
'OK, say 'Ahh'...'%K%P
She suddenly started holding\nthe cracker up to my mouth.%K%P
I knew she would feed it to me after\nmaking me say 'Ahh'.%K%P
'Ahh... *Crunch* *Munch* ... *Munch munch*'%K%P
I chewed on the soy sauce flavored cracker.%K%P
'Apparently it's customary for lovers to\nfeed each other like this.'%K%P
'Where'd you hear that?'%K%P
'That's what it said on the Internet.\nI also heard it from my goddess friends too,\nso it must be true.'%K%P
I had a bad feeling about this...%K%P
'You mean Shuri and Kagura?'%K%P
'No, I couldn't ask them,\nI'm supposed to be the more experienced one.'%K%P
'I asked my friends from L☆SEVEN.\nThings haven't been great between us lately,\nbut I worked up the courage to make up with them.'%K%P
She'd said she felt uncomfortable around them before,\nbut it sounded like that was all in the past now.%K%P
But I had a bad feeling about the members of L☆SEVEN\nknowing all about my love life.%K%P
'Uh... Is that okay?'%K%P
'Why wouldn't it be? They're a great bunch of girls.\nThey've already taught me all kinds of things.'%K%P
I was curious about what 'all kinds of things' meant\nbut I knew I'd find out firsthand before too long.%K%P
